internalRepo.description: Repository configuration for private artifacts. Note that this repository must accept both SNAPSHOT and RELEASE version Maven publications

snapshotsRepo.description: Repository configuration for publicly shared SNAPSHOT artifacts. Usually this is configured with Sonatype's OSS snapshots repository

releasesRepo.description: Repository configuration for publicly shared RELEASE artifacts. Usually this is configured with Sonatype's OSS staging repository

devConfig.description: Development feature configuration options, if any.

devContact.description: Developer contact name (e.g. your organization's name)

mavenSigningKeyEnvProperty.description: Environment variable containing an unencrypted, ASCII armoured Maven PGP signing key

gsVersionsConfig.description: Default versions for core organization dependencies

gradle.description: Gradle version to user inside Github actions

jdkDistribution.description: URL to grab a JDK distribution in tar.gz format

dependencyExcludedGroups.description: Excluded Maven groups when checking for outdated dependencies

pmdRulesUrl.description: Optional URL to find and apply organization-wide PMD coding standard XML rules
